lyrics.stanza: Once I thought the love of God was just for you and me. Once I thought we were the only ones. Now I know God's love can find all those from sea to sea; And when it finds them, they become His sons. God's love is warmer than the warmest sunshine, Softer than a sigh. God's love is deeper than the deepest ocean, Wider than the sky. God's love is brighter than the brightest star That shines every night above; And there is nothing in this world That can ever change His love.
